modName: Dragonborn DragonPriest Masks Cloth Light heavy Armored Circlets
summary: if you have a Dragonborn dragonpriest\'s mask on your inventory you can craft at forge 3 versions of the same mask, cloth, light and heavy, each one with the skin of a circlet.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all! :)

Today I talk you about Dragonborn Dragonpriest\'s masks. 
Very powerful artfacts but sometimes useless. They covers character\'s face, and sometimes are not compatible with the trained kind of armor. 
So, why don\'t wear a DragonPriest\'s mask with the right armor model and a better beautiful appearance, like circlet?

DESCRIPTION:

There are 3 DragoPriest\'s Masks in Dragonborn expansion, for each one there is this chance:
if you have a dragonpriest\'s mask on your inventory you can craft at forge 3 versions of the same mask, cloth, light and heavy.

All models are in Daedric Crafting List, they look like circlets and you need no perk to craft \'em. 

The armor rating is the same of the original models. 

This mod does not change original models, all craftable models are new.

All models can not be unenchanted to learn the enchantments.

You can temper all light and heavy models but you need arcane blacksmith perk. If you want a better armor you need Daedric perk too.

Crafting List: 
cloth, light and heavy model need the same ingretients:

3 Ebony Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Ebony Ingot

WARNING:

There is a little bug: if you have in your inventory different copies of the same mask and you change repeatedly unequiping and equiping the different models may happens that you character gains a PERMANENT boost to elementals damage!! 
I think it may happens because the mask\'s script has been written to work with only copy of the same enchantment at the time.
If you wear a copy and before change another one with the same bonuses you unequip the first, it works well.


REQUIREMENTS:
Skyrim
Dragonborn
Update.esm updates at version 1.9

INSTALLATION:
overwrite Data Folder
Turn on \"Dragonborn DragonPriests Masks by Cybertron77.esp\" in the mod list.

UNINSTALLATION:
Before uninstall, unequip all dragonpriest circlets by your characters and save.

Delete the file \"Dragonborn DragonPriests Masks by Cybertron77.esp\" in the Data folder.

In this page you can find a similar mod for Skyrim DragonPriest\'s Mask :)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39986/?tab=4&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D39986%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1070359&pUp=1

HAVE FUN!!! =D
author: Cybertron77
